    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Jamie's New Six-Point Plan to Improve Food for Britain's Children - Listening Comprehension</string>
            <string language="en">Jamie's New Six-Point Plan to Improve Food for Britain's Children - Listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neuer Plan Sechs-Punkt Jamies, zum der Nahrung 
für Kinder Großbritanniens - hörendes Erfassen zu verbessern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nouveau plan du Six-Point de Jamie pour 
améliorer la nourriture pour les enfants de la Grande-Bretagne - 
compréhension d'écoute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta nova do Seis-Ponto de Jamie para melhorar 
o alimento para crianças de Grâ Bretanha - compreensão escutando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nuovo programma del Sei-Punto del Jamie per 
migliorare alimento per i bambini della Gran-Bretagna - comprensione 
ascoltante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νέο σχέδιο έξι-σημείου Jamie για να βελτιώσει τα 
τρόφιμα για τα παιδιά της Μεγάλης Βρετανίας - κατανόηση 
ακούσματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nuevo plan de la Seis-Punta de Jamie para mejorar
el alimento para los niños de Gran Bretaña - comprensión que 
escucha</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Read the text about the well-known cook Jamie Oliver and then listen to his plan to improve food for Britain’s children. The text is followed by questions on the contents.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
            <string language="en">Read the text about the well-known cook Jamie Oliver and then listen to his plan to improve food for Britain's children. The text is followed by questions on the contents. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">school</string>
            <string language="sv">educational systems</string>
            <string language="sv">United Kingdom</string>
            <string language="sv">Great Britain</string>
            <string language="sv">education</string>
            <string language="sv">food</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="sv">reading comprehension</string>
            <string language="sv">listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">school</string>
            <string language="en">educational systems</string>
            <string language="en">United Kingdom</string>
            <string language="en">Great Britain</string>
            <string language="en">education</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
            <string language="en">listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesen Sie den Text über den weithin bekannten 
Koch Jamie Oliver und hören Sie dann zu seinem Plan, um Nahrung für 
Kinder Großbritanniens zu verbessern. Der Text wird von den 
Fragen über den Inhalt gefolgt. Safir - Englisch und 
Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 6 - was wurden Sie mögen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lisez le texte au sujet du cuisinier bien connu 
Jamie Oliver et puis écoutez son plan pour améliorer la nourriture 
pour les enfants de la Grande-Bretagne. Le texte est suivi des 
questions sur le contenu. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour 
des débutants - module 6 - que aimez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leia o texto sobre o cozinheiro well-known Jamie 
Oliver e escute então sua planta para melhorar o alimento para 
crianças de Grâ Bretanha. O texto é seguido por perguntas nos
índices. Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para 
novatos - módulo 6 - que  você gosta?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legga il testo circa il cuoco ben noto Jamie 
Oliver ed allora ascolti il suo programma per migliorare l'alimento 
per i bambini della Gran-Bretagna. Il testo è seguito dalle 
domande sul soddisfare. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i 
principianti - modulo 6 - che cosa gradite?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαβάστε το κείμενο για το γνωστό μάγειρα Jamie 
oliver και ακούστε έπειτα το σχέδιό του για να βελτιώσετε τα 
τρόφιμα για τα παιδιά της Μεγάλης Βρετανίας. Το κείμενο 
ακολουθείται από τις ερωτήσεις στο περιεχόμενο. Safir - 
αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 6
- τι θα θέλατε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lea el texto sobre el cocinero bien conocido 
Jamie Oliver y después escuche su plan para mejorar el alimento para 
los niños de Gran Bretaña. El texto es seguido por preguntas 
sobre el contenido. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los 
principiantes - módulo 6 - qué  usted tiene gusto?</string>
          </description>
